pr_title: testutils: Partially revert 2448 prevent setup and creation of the log

timeline.message:
testutils: Partially revert 2448 prevent setup and creation of the log

Otherwise on some platforms (Win10) zap.log might seem to be in use.

Signed-off-by: kingthorin <kingthorin@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyHTML:
Better as?

Suggested change
Path xmlDir = Files.createDirectory(tempDir.resolve("install/xml"));
Path xmlDir = Files.createDirectory(tempDir.resolve(zapInstallDir + "/xml"));
timeline.author: kingthorin

replies.author: thc202
